verses.name: Galatians 1:1
verses.text: Paul, an apostle, (not of men, neither by man, but by Jesus Christ, and God the Father, who raised him from the dead;)

verses.name: Galatians 1:2
verses.text: And all the brethren which are with me, unto the churches of Galatia:

verses.name: Galatians 1:3
verses.text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father, and from our Lord Jesus Christ,

verses.name: Galatians 1:4
verses.text: Who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us from this present evil world, according to the will of God and our Father:

verses.name: Galatians 1:5
verses.text: To whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
